channel.title: Very Interesting
channel.description:
Only in America ......do drugstores make the sick walk all the way to the back of the store to get their prescriptions while healthy people can buy cigarettes at the front.
Only in America......do people order double cheeseburgers, large fries, and a diet coke.
Only in America.....do banks leave both doors open and then chain the pens to the counters.
Only in America .....do we leave cars worth thousands of dollars in the driveway and put our useless junk in the garage..
Only in America ......do we buy hot dogs in packages of ten and buns in packages of eight.
Only in America .....do we use the word 'politics' to describe the process so well: 'Poli' in Latin meaning 'many' and 'tics' meaning 'bloodsucking creatures'.
Only in America.....do they have drive-up ATM machines with Braille lettering
EVER WONDER ....
Why the sun lightens our hair, but darkens our skin ?
WHY CANT WOMEN PUT ON MASCARA WITH THEIR MOUTH CLOSED? (verrry true)
Why don't you ever see the headline "Psychic Wins Lottery"?
Why is "abbreviated" such a long word?
Why is it that doctors and lawyers call what they do "practice"?
Why is lemon juice made with artificial flavor, and dish washing liquid made with real lemons?
Why is the man who invests all your money called a broker?
Why is the time of day with the slowest traffic called rush hour?
Why isn't there mouse-flavored cat food?
Why didn't Noah swat those two mosquitoes?
Why do they sterilize the needle for lethal injections?
You know that indestructible black box that is used on airplanes? Why don't they make the whole plane out of that stuff?!
Why don't sheep shrink when it rains?
Why are they called apartments when they are all stuck together?
If con is the opposite of pro, is Congress the opposite of progress?
If flying is so safe, why do they call the airport the terminal?

item.title: Very Interesting
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:10, topic:275224”][quote author=Newty link=topic=363590.msg2761525#msg2761525 date=1240547697]

I’m not American and a lot of this still applies. And whats wrong with a double cheeseburger, large fries, and
a diet coke. That wouldn’t even fill me at all. Actually, diet coke is pretty shitty.

The diet coke is ironic. You just ordered enough grease/fat to kill a dwarf and then, to ease your guilty conscience you order a diet coke.
[/quote]

some people actually perfer the taste of diet products they find the chemical sweetness to be quite good. I always find it to have a terrible aftertaste.[/quote]
Diet * is shit no matter what way you look at it. The taste sucks while you’re drinking it, and like you said, the aftertaste is terrible.

[quote=“PeterMan, post:11, topic:275224”]Also, eating fast food once in a while is not that dangerous.

Anyone seen Supersize me? :P[/quote]
Yah. That movie made me want to supersize my next McDonalds meal.

Read full topic

item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“american_girl, post:27, topic:275224”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=363590.msg2761309#msg2761309 date=1240536334]

WHY CANT WOMEN PUT ON MASCARA WITH THEIR MOUTH CLOSED? (verrry true)

[/quote]

ok that is such an over statement

Michigan is a fat state =/[/quote]Oh, how true. Even though I am not fat, I am suffocating.

item.title: Very Interesting
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:23, topic:275224”][quote author=Elijah_ (That One Guy) link=topic=363590.msg2762090#msg2762090 date=1240603562]
No such thing as a Double Big Mac. A Big Mac has two patties, so it’s already a double.[/quote]

Uh, I get it all the time. It’s called a double bigmac but it has 4 patties. They have another one, with 8 patties on it too. Monster mac or something…

But I’d take homemade burgers instead of McDonalds anytime

They taste completely different though. I don’t eat fast food cuz I want a burger, I eat it cuz it’s like a nasty greasy pile of awesomeness.[/quote]

Damn, that’s not right. I guess that’s restricted to countries who have self-control. We only have the regular Big Mac here in Kentucky.

Read full topic

item.title: Very Interesting
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:20, topic:275224”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=363590.msg2762077#msg2762077 date=1240603195]

[quote author=PeterMan link=topic=363590.msg2762068#msg2762068 date=1240602771]

Also, eating fast food once in a while is not that dangerous.

Anyone seen Supersize me?
[/quote]Yeah, I watched it in my 8th grade health class Isn’t it the movie where the guy eats nothing but mcdonalds for a month?

Yeah it is. Too bad I wanted McDonalds when I saw it.
[/quote]Can you say, Big Mac with a side of Large Fries?

Can you say 3 double big macs, large fries, large milkshake… and a dime bag.

McDonalds is crap anyways. <3 wendys + dairy queen[/quote]I’d bash you right now, but you’re too passive

Read full topic

item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:16, topic:275224”][quote author=Niall link=topic=363590.msg2761674#msg2761674 date=1240575067]

Only in America…do banks leave both doors open and then chain the pens
to the counters.

Only in America …do we leave cars worth thousands of dollars in the
driveway and put our useless junk in the garage…

Both of these happen in Australia.

I’d say it happens in England too, and I’ve never seen a house with a garage with a car outside.
[/quote]
we have 4 cars and 1 garage all cars are outside and the garage is full of shit[/quote]
we don’t even lock our house where i live.

Shame.

In America, Texas is the one to blame for all the fatties, but as in Colorado, we are the healthiest state.
[/quote]
this is now an america vs rest of world thread[/quote]
As an American, I can truthfully say the rest of the world is much better.
